thread.section_title: The Soho Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Breakfast review only!
thread.title_full: Breakfast review only! - Review of The Soho Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: ElseyMaySun
title: Breakfast review only!
text:
I came here for breakfast on a Tuesday a couple of weeks ago. The food was good and the service, while a little slow, was very friendly and welcoming.
The food was lovely but, I must admit, I still didn't feel as though the 'refuel breakfast' I had was worth Â£26.00. I work in Soho and often eat out nearby and I think that is by far the most I have paid for a full English yet!
That said, I didn't stay as a hotel guest and, judging by the lovely decor, the higher prices are probably indicative of the overall experience. So go and see for yourselves!
